title: Scary?
review: After watching the film, I was left with a feeling of dissatisfaction.  The end left us confused and unsettled as to what exactly happened to the students.  Also, if the students were as lost as they were, wouldn't they keep looking for civilization, instead of stopping all the time.  Maybe not throw the map into the creek, and maybe making a map that is actually legible.  I was disappointed in this film
